title: User Login Process
description: User login details such as login state, location, and type, as well as forgot username and password counts.

accountSwitch.title: Switch User Accounts
accountSwitch.description: Captures when a visitor switches their account during a visit.

cookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
cookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

cookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
cookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

forgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
forgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

login.title: Visitor Login
login.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

loginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
loginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

loginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
loginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

loginLocation.title: Login Page Location
loginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

loginKeychain.title: Keychain
loginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

loginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
loginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

loginStatus.title: Login Status
loginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

loginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
loginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

loginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
loginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

logout.title: Visitor Logout
logout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

sessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
sessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

updateProfile.title: Account Profile Update
updateProfile.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.
